name: 50mon (Wast3Man)
description:
Game for demonstrating Pokemon features. 

So in the seventh lecture of CS50, we are introduced to the most famous RPG game ever created after the Legend of Zelda, Pokemon. So the assignment was to make a menu for showing how much our pokemon levelled up after a few fights. 

The repo of the code: https://github.com/Wast3man/pokemon-with-assignment

I hope you enjoy it! Thank you

Any feedback is highly appreciated.
